General.Name: ALX Resources Corp
General.Description: ALX Resources Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for cobalt, nickel, lithium, uranium, copper, and gold deposits. The company was formerly known as ALX Uranium Corp. and changed its name to ALX Resources Corp. in January 2020. ALX Resources Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1199 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2R1
